meta.summary:
b'Mobilize alongside the combat medic who made the shrewd decision to make the world a better place, one bandage... or bullet at a time: Baptiste.

Begin your watch: http://buyoverwatch.com
Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/playoverwatch
Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/playoverwatch
Join us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playoverwatch'

b"Join Jeff Kaplan as he discusses the 30th hero in OverwatchBaptiste!
He provides some insight into his back story, abilities, and overall strategy. Baptiste is currently available for testing on the PTR. 

ESRB Rating: TEEN with Blood, Use of Tobacco, Violence.

00:14 Jeff introduces our newest heroBaptiste!
00:28 The backstory of Baptiste
01:59 The gameplay of the new support hero, Baptiste
03:37 Baptiste's secondary ability, the Immortality Field
04:55 The Exo Boots
06:15 Baptiste's ultimate ability, the Amplification Matrix
07:50 Thanks for joining us and have fun testing Baptiste on the PTR!

Begin your watch: http://buyoverwatch.com
Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/playoverwatch
Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/playoverwatch
Join us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playoverwatch"

item.title: Overwatch: NEW Hero Baptiste Gameplay! - ALL Abilities Breakdown

meta.summary:
b"Overwatch's NEW Hero Batiste is finally here and in todays video we break down all of his abilities in some gameplay on the PTR! Let us know what you think to this insane new hero and be sure to drop a Like & Subscribe if you enjoyed!

Subscribe here - http://bit.ly/2aN1OuO

Razer makes the best equipment, check out here! http://rzr.to/lnvvm

We are YOUR OVERWATCH:
Patreon - https://www.patreon.com/YourOverwatch
Twitter - https://twitter.com/youroverwatchyt

Discord Server:
https://discordapp.com/invite/youroverwatch

FREEDO's personal channel for Overwatch esports talk and more!
https://www.youtube.com/user/xfreeedo"

b'New hero Baptiste gameplay is here! With Overwatch Hero 30 on the PTR, we finally get to test out his kit and abilities in an actual match. Feel feels pretty fun!

Thanks for watching and be sure to hit LIKE, SUBSCRIBE, and NOTIFICATIONS for more Master Ian Gamer Overwatch videos!

Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/masteriangamer
Twitter: https://twitter.com/masteriangamer

#Overwatch #OverwatchBaptiste #Baptiste
